entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sarnia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Rain, 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sarnia Chris Hadfield Airport 09:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Rain
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: E 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 13.
entry.summary: Rain ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
